titleStmt.title: The prayse and commendacion of suche as sought comenwealthes and to the co[n]trary, the ende and discommendacion of such as sought priuate welthes. Gathered both out of the Scripture and phylozophers.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Anthony Scoloker dwelling in the Sauoy re[n]ts. Wythout Templebarre,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and address from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
